overview: Lucas Entertainment's Just Do Him Raw is the studio's tribute to some of its most athletic models that love working up a sweat both in the gym and the bedroom! Exclusive models Jake Andrews, Jimmie Slater, Trey Williams, and Tanner Bradley star alongside Ethan Stark, Draven Torres, Rico Romero, and Rafael Carreras. Have a footwear and athlete fetish? Then don't miss Just Do Him Raw!
title: Just Do Him Raw
